strings.launchMessage: This is a developer sample. You can say start cooking, set reminder, play sound, check status, or count down.
strings.repromptMessage: What else can I help you with?
strings.helpMessageSSML: <speak>The skill can perform tasks or launch connections to other skills <break strength="strong"/>To start, just say set reminder, check status, play sound, or count down.</speak>
strings.fallbackMessageSSML: <speak>The skill can perform tasks or launch connections to other provider skills <break strength="strong"/>What would you like to try?</speak>
strings.errorMessage: Sorry, I had trouble doing what you asked. Please try again.
strings.sessionResumedMessage: Welcome back to Task Buddy! You can say set reminder, play sound, check status, or count down. What do you want to do?
strings.campaignMessage: Your campaign is {campaign}. You get {discount}% on all {category} items.
strings.hiddenParamMessage: The hidden a. 2. z. ref param is {hiddenParam}.
strings.createReminderErrorMessage: There was an error creating the reminder. Please try again.
strings.resumingMessage: Resume streaming a long form audio now.
strings.reminderText: Task Buddy: It's time to grab coffee and take a walk!
strings.reminderSSML: <speak>It's time to grab coffee and take a walk!</speak>
strings.reminderDenied: What else can I help you with?
strings.reminderNotAnswered: Sorry, I need your permissions to create reminders or resume skills.
strings.reminderConsentCardMessage: We need you to enable reminders. I just sent the request to your alexa app.
strings.CREATE_TIMER_OK_MSG: Your timer is now running! You can also try, check my timer. pause my timer, resume my timer, or delete my timer.
strings.CREATE_TIMER_ERROR_MSG: Failed to create the timer. Sorry!
strings.VOICE_PERMISSION_ACCEPTED: You can now set a timer by saying, set a timer of, followed by the duration.
strings.VOICE_PERMISSION_DENIED: We can't continue if you don't allow timers. Please try again later.
strings.VOICE_PERMISSION_ERROR: There was an error enabling the permissions. Please try again later.
strings.PERMISSIONS_CARD_MSG: I just sent you a card to the Alexa app to enable permissions for Timers. Please enable it and open the skill again! Bye
strings.READ_TIMER_ERROR_MSG: Failed to read the timer status. Sorry!
strings.DELETE_TIMER_OK_MSG: Your timer has been deleted! If you want to create another one just say, set a timer of, followed by the duration.
strings.DELETE_TIMER_ERROR_MSG: Failed to delete the timer. Sorry!
strings.PAUSE_TIMER_OK_MSG: Your timers have been paused! If you want to resume them just say, resume my timers.
strings.RESUME_TIMER_OK_MSG: Your timers have been resumed! If you want to pause them just say, pause my timers.
strings.NO_TIMER_MSG: You haven't set a timer. Try saying, set a timer.
strings.REPROMPT_MSG: What else can I help you with?
